input.label: Select tcpdump file:
input.populatingSearch: index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv | rex field=source "pcap(\\\\|\/)PCAPcsv(\\\\|\/)(?<source>.*)" |stats count by source

table.title: Number of Hops for each Conversation
table.searchString: index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv source="*$Source$*" "$IP1$" AND "$IP2$"| eval hop=if(ttl<32, 32-ttl, if(ttl=32, 32-ttl, if(ttl<64, 64-ttl, if(ttl=64, 64-ttl, if(ttl<128, 128-ttl, if(ttl=128, 128-ttl, if(ttl<256, 255-ttl,0))))))) | eval conn=src_ip+"->"+dst_ip | dedup conn |table conn ttl hop| rename conn as "Conversation"| rename ttl as TTL | rename hop as "Hops"
